title: Nexxus Therappe Shampoo, Luxurious Moisturizing, 13.5 oz.
description: Salon hair care. Experience Nexxus luxury. Scientifically developed. Salon proven. Therappe Luxurious Moisturizing Shampoo, now enhanced for superior salon performance and advanced moisturization, is specially formulated with rosemary, chamomile and nettle, to gently cleanse for nourished, healthy looking hair. Fortified with exclusive NexxuSphere time released technology, containing nutrients, antioxidants, and UV protectors. Never tested on animals. Made in USA.
